page.title: 05Waddon Estate
page.content:
Driving around the council estate near Pampisford Road was surprising to me because the houses are nearly identical. They are semi-detached or in fours, and all the same colours, either cream, green or brown. Garages are not included with the house, so cars have to park on the roads or pavements. The gardens are cramped and squashed up. There are a lot of roads which all look the same. We got lost. There is a huge park nearby but there is nothing much in it. It is used for football in the winter, but there was nobody there when we was there. Some people use it to walk their dogs.
By Cumnor House School
